about.title: About Nextville
about.paragraph-one: Nextville is a privately owned consultancy and management company, with a focus on the digital sector and company growth. We have an entrepreneurial background ourselves. If we engage in a venture, we can invest time and/or our own capital. We have built the operation by starting our own companies, but also by investing in other great entrepreneurs. We help them reach their full potential.
about.paragraph-two: We have a long successful history in the sector Digital Services, AI, and Entertainment. Our strengths often lie in businesses that have a strong focus on creative and technology oriented staff, where company culture and keeping up with the latest is crucial. We have created sustainable growth of 20-30% per annum and received record number of Gazelles and similar awards. Recently we expanded investments into the energy sector as well.

values.title: At Nextville we
values.value-one: pragmatically focus on simple things like profit and customers
values.value-two: know that people are more important than ideas
values.value-three: prefer a low profile and invest for the long-term
values.value-four: believe sustainability is important for long-term value
values.value-five: only invest using our own funds
values.value-six: do things we enjoy and have fun

people.title: This is Nextville
people.description: Nextville is build on a network of independent successful specialist, who can function both as management consultants and as investors. This makes it easier for us to cover a broader range of sectors and deliver the focused skillsets needed.
